location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a letter from Mr Elton reporting on the Wahabee [Wahabi] Ameer [Amir] remaining at Lahsah [Hasa] and reports from Sheikh Esou [Shaikh Isa bin Ali Al-Khalifah] that Nassir ben Mobarek [Nasir bin Mubarak] and his bedouins are also there and that several eye witnesses have reported that the Wahabee Ameer has publically ridiculed the letter sent to him by the British Government and have made other comments regarding the Government's lack of response to the attack at Demam [Dammam].
